item.title: heh.
item.description: remember. I rule. k3r051n3: you know what reallly scares me about this? k3r051n3: http://nata2.info/?path=pictures2Fevents%2F2004%3A05%3A13_india%2Fdelhi_agra&img=IMG_0101.jpg linuXKilla: what k3r051n3: no? well i’ll tell you k3r051n3: the expression on your face linuXKilla: haha k3r051n3: you are looking so noam linuXKilla: noam? k3r051n3: chomsky linuXKilla: haha k3r051n3: and it scares me it apparently never stops.
